title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the AdaptiveLearningPathCreator system, including user personas, goals, features, constraints, and non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, and accessibility. Identify stakeholders and conduct interviews or workshops to gather requirements. Ensure to cover requirements related to the AI-driven personalization engine, user interface, data management, integration with coding platforms or resources, and any other relevant aspects.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Key aspects include: 1) User management and authentication (e.g., role-based access control, user profiles), 2) Skill assessment and coding challenge engine (e.g., problem statement management, submission handling, automated testing), 3) Learning path generation algorithm (e.g., user profiling, content mapping, personalization techniques), 4) Content management system for learning resources (e.g., course materials, tutorials, practice exercises), 5) User progress tracking and reporting (e.g., performance metrics, learning analytics), 6) Scalability and performance considerations (e.g., load balancing, caching, asynchronous processing, microservices architecture), 7) Integration with third-party services (e.g., authentication providers, coding platforms, APIs for content delivery), 8) Security and data privacy measures (e.g., encryption at rest and in transit, access controls, secure storage of sensitive information, data retention policies), 9) Deployment and infrastructure requirements (e.g., cloud or on-premises, containerization, CI/CD pipelines), 10) Monitoring and logging strategies (e.g., error handling, application health monitoring, audit trails, log aggregation tools), 11) Edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations (e.g., validation checks, caching strategies for frequently accessed data, efficient database queries), 12) Unit and integration testing considerations (e.g., test coverage targets, testing frameworks).

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the AdaptiveLearningPathCreator system.

title: Implement Adaptive Learning Algorithm
description: Develop the core algorithm that creates personalized learning paths based on user data and performance.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, coding challenges, and learning paths.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and implement security measures and access controls to protect user data and system integrity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the AdaptiveLearningPathCreator system.

title: Create Test Suite and Test Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and test plan to ensure the quality and functionality of the system.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation for the AdaptiveLearningPathCreator system, including user guides, developer guides, and system architecture documentation.
